documents.about: Scent Safari Perfumes is Kenya's premier online destination for authentic luxury fragrances. We curate the finest perfumes from world-renowned brands, ensuring every bottle is genuine and fresh. Our mission is to make luxury fragrances accessible to the modern African consumer through competitive pricing and exceptional service.
documents.return_policy: We offer a 14-day return policy for unopened perfumes in original packaging. Due to hygiene reasons, opened or used perfumes cannot be returned unless defective. If you receive a damaged or incorrect item, contact us within 48 hours for immediate replacement or refund.
documents.delivery_policy: Free delivery within Nairobi for orders above KES 5000. Standard delivery (2-3 days) costs KES 500. Express delivery (next day) available for KES 1000. We use secure packaging to prevent damage and ensure authenticity. Signature required on delivery.
documents.payment_policy: We accept M-Pesa, card payments, and bank transfers. Payment is required before shipping. For high-value orders (above KES 20,000), we may require additional verification. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

faqs.question: How do I know the perfumes are authentic?
faqs.answer: All our perfumes are sourced directly from authorized distributors and come with authenticity certificates. Each bottle has proper batch codes and packaging. We guarantee 100% authenticity or your money back.

faqs.question: Can I try a perfume before buying?
faqs.answer: We offer sample vials (2ml) for most fragrances at KES 500 each. This lets you test the scent before committing to a full bottle. Sample costs can be deducted from your full-size purchase within 30 days.

faqs.question: How should I store my perfumes?
faqs.answer: Store perfumes in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and heat. Avoid bathrooms due to humidity. Keep bottles upright and tightly closed. Proper storage can extend fragrance life to 3-5 years.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer digital gift cards in denominations from KES 2,000 to KES 20,000. Perfect for birthdays, anniversaries, or any special occasion. Gift cards are valid for 12 months from purchase date.

faqs.question: What's the difference between Eau de Parfum and Eau de Toilette?
faqs.answer: Eau de Parfum (EDP) has higher fragrance concentration (15-20%) and lasts 6-8 hours. Eau de Toilette (EDT) has lower concentration (5-15%) and lasts 3-5 hours. EDP is more intense, EDT is lighter and more suitable for daytime wear.
